sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: The Attachment Hash Matcher is a Flow Action that calculates and compares attachment file hashes to detect duplicates, verify file integrity, and prevent redundant uploads. Supports MD5, SHA-1, and SHA-256 hash algorithms.
